description:
This plugin extends Movian with support for playing game console music files

Based on the fantastic libGME
Game_Music_Emu library copyright (C) 2003-2009 Shay Green.
Sega Genesis YM2612 emulator copyright (C) 2002 Stephane Dallongeville.
author: Andreas Smas
title: Game Music Engine
synopsis: Play music files from NES, SNES, etc
